HomePage.title: Begin Your Creation
HomePage.subtitle: Choose a jewelry type to start designing. Each piece is a canvas for your story, waiting to be adorned with charms that speak to you.

jewelry_types.earring_description: Stylish earrings to complete your look.

HomePage.model_selection_subtitle: Select a beautiful {jewelryTypeName} model as the foundation for your custom design.
HomePage.footer_text: © {year} Atelier à bijoux. All rights reserved.
HomePage.support_dialog_description: Have a question or need help with your order?
HomePage.support_dialog_instructions: You can reach us by email. Copy the address below or use the button to open your mail client directly.

Editor.added_charms_placeholder: Drag or click charms to add them to your jewelry.
Editor.ai_suggestions_description: Let our AI help you find the perfect placement for your charms.
Editor.preferences_placeholder: e.g., 'I like asymmetrical designs' or 'a minimalist look'
Editor.error_generating_suggestions: An error occurred while generating suggestions. Please try again.
Editor.suggestions_placeholder_title: Your creative suggestions will appear here.
Editor.toast_item_added_description: {modelName} has been added to your cart.
Editor.toast_item_updated_description: Your design for {modelName} has been updated in the cart.

Cart.title: Your Cart
Cart.empty_description: Find the perfect piece to start your creation.
Cart.preview_description: Here is a preview of your custom creation.
Cart.checkout_success_description: Your order has been successfully placed.

Admin.reorder_dialog_description: You can open the provider's URL to place an order, or manage the stock status here.
Admin.orders_description: View and manage all customer orders.
Admin.ship_order_dialog_description: Please enter the shipping details for this order.
Admin.cancel_order_dialog_description: Please enter the reason for cancellation. An email will be sent to the customer informing them of the full refund.
Admin.cancellation_reason_placeholder: e.g., Item out of stock, quality issue...

Checkout.title: Checkout
Checkout.description: Please fill in your details to complete the order.
Checkout.payment_simulation_notice: This is a simulation. Do not enter real card details.
Checkout.success_description: A summary of your order has been sent to {email}. You will be notified when your creation is shipped.

OrderStatus.status_cancelled_description: This order has been cancelled. Please contact customer support if you have any questions.
OrderStatus.track_description: Enter your order number to see its status.
OrderStatus.find_orders_description: Enter your email address to find your order numbers.
OrderStatus.email_sent_description: If any orders are associated with this email address, an email with your order numbers has been sent.
